ComicInfo.Summary:
Coda
DOUBLE-SIZED ONE-SHOT!
We look to the past and future of our characters' lives as we welcome guest creators to create 8 short stories.
Lilith remembers when she and Song walked through the mirror for the first time. Trakgnar reminisces on his favorite kill. Anthony and Gia mend their friendship. Augusten considers a change in career. Wally adjusts to life in Florida. Bailey contemplates destiny. Taylor tells her side of the story. Theresa writes a letter to Logan.
Destiny, NY returns for Season Four in August!
*Story Titles* Song & Lilith Aberdine in... Joyride Trahgnar in... Chaos Gia Espinosa and Anthony Lily in... Floating Augusten Gaines in... Just Wally Nguyen in... Cinna Fuck It Bailey Ross in... Magic Taylor Hart in... Visions of You Theresa McBride in... Dear Logan
https://comicvine.gamespot.com/destiny-ny-22-chapter-nine-coda/4000-766437/
